title: Fataplus AgriTech Platform
author: Fataplus Team <contact@fata.plus>
description: Comprehensive SaaS platform for African agriculture featuring weather intelligence, livestock management, e-commerce, LMS, mobile money integration, and AI-powered insights. Designed specifically for rural connectivity challenges with offline-first architecture and multi-language support.
tagline: Building the future of African Agriculture

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release featuring: Multi-context SaaS architecture, Weather intelligence with AI predictions, Livestock management with health tracking, E-commerce marketplace, Learning Management System, Mobile money integration (M-Pesa, Airtel Money), LDAP authentication, Multi-language support (Swahili, French, Arabic, Portuguese), Offline-first design, Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for AI integration

installationNotes: This app requires configuration of external API keys for full functionality. Weather data requires OpenWeatherMap API key. Payment processing requires Stripe/mobile money provider credentials.

JWT_SECRET_KEY.description: JWT secret key for authentication (auto-generated if not provided)

OPENWEATHER_API_KEY.description: OpenWeatherMap API key for weather data (optional - get from openweathermap.org)

STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Stripe public key for payment processing (optional)

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret key for payment processing (optional)

MPESA_API_KEY.description: M-Pesa API key for mobile money payments (optional)

AIRTEL_API_KEY.description: Airtel Money API key for mobile payments (optional)

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: SendGrid API key for email notifications (optional)
